share on x sabrina dyke. jun 14 at 1:48 pm i had the pleasure of meeting this man and am so upset with myself for not going to visit him like i said i was gonna do. now this sweet man has passed away and i will never get to see him again. r. i. p. raymond i will never forget your sweet smile. sad to say there are no excuses to be made i just didn't take the time to go. and for this i will always be sorry1 comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x sk shayla lucas keplinger. jun 14 at 12:07 pm lit a candle in memory of raymond r. kesner sr. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x gs gene & fran stickley. jun 14 at 9:29 am lit a candle in memory of raymond r. kesner sr. 1 comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x sk sandra dove knight. jun 14 at 6:23 am lit a candle in memory of raymond r. kesner sr. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x dm dave and wanda myersjun 13 at 11:11 pm lit a candle in memory of raymond r. kesner sr. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x lc linda conradjun 13 at 9:38 pm lit a candle in memory of raymond r. kesner sr. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x marietta smalling. jun 13 at 9:30 pm lit a candle in memory of raymond r. kesner sr. 1 comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x bk bonnie & roger kessel. jun 13 at 8:05 pm lit a candle in memory of raymond r. kesner sr. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... visitation. jun 17. 2:00 pm -
